report.title: MNHNL Butterflies Section Based Data Report
report.query: SELECT s.id as sample_id, s2.id as subsample_id, occdet.id as occurrence_id, sav0.text_value as encoded_by, rtrim(s.location_name, chr(160)) as location_name, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, sav1.text_value as observer, tmonth.term as month, tnumber.term as number_in_month, sav4.text_value as start_time, sav5.text_value as end_time, sav6.float_value as temperature, twind.term as wind, tcloud.term as cloud, s.comment as comment, (select max(cast(split_part(s3.location_name, ' ', 3) as integer)) from samples s3 where s3.parent_id = s.id and s3.deleted = false and s3.location_name like 'SL%') as num_sections, split_part(s2.location_name, ' ', 3) as section, thabitat.term as habitat, CASE sav11.int_value WHEN 0 THEN 'No'::text ELSE 'Yes'::text END as no_obs, treliability.term as reliability, occdet.taxon as taxon, occdet.observation as observation, (CASE occdet.record_status WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'D' THEN 'Dubious' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In progress' WHEN 'C' THEN 'Complete' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Awaiting check' ELSE occdet.record_status END) as record_status FROM samples s INNER JOIN samples s2 ON s2.parent_id = s.id and s2.deleted = false and s2.location_name like 'SL%' INNER JOIN sample_attribute_values sav0 ON sav0.sample_id = s.id AND sav0.sample_attribute_id = #username_attr_id# and sav0.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav1 ON sav1.sample_id = s.id AND sav1.sample_attribute_id = #observer_attr_id# and sav1.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav2 ON sav2.sample_id = s.id AND sav2.sample_attribute_id = #month_attr_id# and sav2.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav3 ON sav3.sample_id = s.id AND sav3.sample_attribute_id = #numberinmonth_attr_id# and sav3.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav4 ON sav4.sample_id = s.id AND sav4.sample_attribute_id = #starttime_attr_id# and sav4.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav5 ON sav5.sample_id = s.id AND sav5.sample_attribute_id = #endtime_attr_id# and sav5.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav6 ON sav6.sample_id = s.id AND sav6.sample_attribute_id = #temperature_attr_id# and sav6.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav7 ON sav7.sample_id = s.id AND sav7.sample_attribute_id = #wind_attr_id# and sav7.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav8 ON sav8.sample_id = s.id AND sav8.sample_attribute_id = #cloud_attr_id# and sav8.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav9 ON sav9.sample_id = s2.id AND sav9.sample_attribute_id = #habitat_attr_id# and sav9.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav10 ON sav10.sample_id = s2.id AND sav10.sample_attribute_id = #reliability_attr_id# and sav10.deleted = FALSE LEFT JOIN sample_attribute_values sav11 ON sav11.sample_id = s2.id AND sav11.sample_attribute_id = #no_obs_attr_id# and sav11.deleted = FALSE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT o.id as id, o.sample_id as sample_id, dttl.taxon as taxon, oav1.int_value as observation, o.record_status as record_status FROM occurrences o INNER JOIN detail_taxa_taxon_lists dttl ON o.taxa_taxon_list_id = dttl.id INNER JOIN occurrence_attribute_values oav1 ON oav1.occurrence_id = o.id and oav1.deleted = FALSE and oav1.int_value is not null WHERE o.deleted = false) occdet ON occdet.sample_id = s2.id LEFT JOIN detail_termlists_terms tmonth ON tmonth.id=sav2.int_value LEFT JOIN detail_termlists_terms tnumber ON tnumber.id=sav3.int_value LEFT JOIN detail_termlists_terms twind ON twind.id=sav7.int_value LEFT JOIN detail_termlists_terms tcloud ON tcloud.id=sav8.int_value LEFT JOIN detail_termlists_terms thabitat ON thabitat.meaning_id=sav9.int_value LEFT JOIN detail_termlists_terms treliability ON treliability.meaning_id=sav10.int_value WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL #order_by#
